biocontainers.name: bioperl
biocontainers.summary: A collection of perl modules that facilitate the development of perl scripts for bioinformatics applications.  it provides software modules for many of the typical tasks of bioinformatics programming.

biotools.summary: A collection of Perl modules that facilitate the development of Perl scripts for bioinformatics applications.  It provides software modules for many of the typical tasks of bioinformatics programming.

bioschemas.summary: A collection of Perl modules that facilitate the development of Perl scripts for bioinformatics applications.  It provides software modules for many of the typical tasks of bioinformatics programming.

galaxy.summary: Converts GenBank format files to GFF3
